title: Future Soldiers
description: 5 low poly science fiction soldiers with gun and 30 animations.
longDescription: Preview: youtu.be/YmlC3KUBSdo Future Soldiers pack contain: • Customizable material • 2 low poly models: Character: 1924 tris, Gun: 1148 tris • 2 draw calls • 30 Animations • 5 Future Soldiers with 5 guns • 5 Character materials (2048x2048px): diffuse, roughness, normal, ao • 5 Gun materials(1024x1024px): diffuse, roughness, normal, ao Animations: • RunForward, RunRight, RunLeft, RunBack • Sprint • RunForwardShoot, RunRightShoot, RunLeftShoot, RunBackShoot • Idle • Idle2 • Shoot • JumpAndShoot (start,loop,end) • Jump (start,loop,end) • GetCover (start,loop,end) • ShootFromCover • RollFront, RollBack, RollLeft, RollRight • Lying • LyingShoot • CrawlingFront, CrawlingRight, CrawlingLeft, CrawlingBack • ReloadWeapon • Damage • Death1 • Death2 Character can be used in sci-fi, space, post apocalypse game types.
technicalDetails:
Scaled to Epic skeleton: No 
Rigged: Yes 
Rigged to Epic skeleton: No 
Animated: Yes 
Number of characters: 1 
Vertex counts of characters: 1640 
Texture Resolutions: 2048x2048 
Number of Animations: 30 
Animation types (Root Motion/In-place): 1/29
Intended Platform: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One 
Platforms Tested: PC 
Documentation Included: Yes 
Important\Additional Notes:
Character have Basic character BP and anim graph, but please take a note that this is only for preview purpose. This code it's not created by gameplay programmer. We are selling assets with models and animations. If you want to use this code and change it, feel free to do this :) I hope it will help you.

List of changes: 
Update 1.1 
Character turns when you pointing your gun up-down. 
Gun shoot where the camera point.
